list_definition.definition: the path in which something moves around a planet, star etc, eg the path of the Earth round the Sun or of a spacecraft round the Earth

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The spaceship is in orbit round the moon.
The spacecraft orbits the Earth every 24 hours.
